subject: Medicine
title: Conditioning: Pavlov Meets Medicine
description: A quick win: understand Conditioning: Pavlov Meets Medicine.

hook.text: Pavlov's dogs drooled at a bell; your body does the same with pills.

buildup.text: If a drug always works, your body learns to expect relief.

discovery.text: Eventually the ritual alone triggers the same response.

twist.text: Patients switched to placebos still respond for several doses.

climax.text: The body's learned response fades slowly without the real drug.

quiz.question: How does conditioning contribute to the placebo effect?
options: The body learns to associate the ritual with relief
It trains the body to ignore all pain
